original_title: Shake Hands with the Devil: The Journey of Roméo Dallaire
overview: The story of Canadian Lt. Gen. Roméo Dallaire and his controversial command of the United Nations mission to Rwanda during the 1994 genocide. The documentary was inspired by the book Shake Hands with the Devil: The Failure of Humanity in Rwanda which was published in 2003.
title: Shake Hands with the Devil: The Journey of Roméo Dallaire
